name: Tenets of the Slayer
entries: Shelter the Hunted. Aid those that are harmed by your quarry and the forces of evil.
Quell your Quarry. Seek out your quarry wherever they may hide and show no mercy in quelling their plots.
Restore the Broken. A slayers job does not end when the quarry is dead. Help tore build that which has been broken by evil.
